tool_description: BrandGenius is your one-stop solution for creating unique and compelling brand names and taglines. Harness the power of Artificial Intelligence to craft brand identities that resonate with your audience. Our innovative API simplifies the creative process, ensuring your brand stands out in a crowded market. Plus, we offer an exclusive endpoint to verify domain name availability across a wide range of top-level domains, making it easier than ever to secure your online presence.
name: BrandGenius
title: BrandGenius

api_list.name: Generate Brand Name and Tagline
api_list.description: REST API endpoint to generate an AI driven Brand name and Tagline based on provided short description or key words of the business. Maximum 100 characters allowed for the parameter value.

required_parameters.name: description
required_parameters.default: media, publication and mobile application development

api_list.name: Check Domain Availability
api_list.description: REST API endpoint to check domain name availability in the Internet based on the provided Brand or Business name. This API endpoint will check availability of most of the famous and highly used Top level Domains for availability.
